description: {"blocks":[{"key":"12q9h","text":"This protocol details reversible fixation for cells and tissues for subsequent use in sc/snRNA, sc/snATAC or Multiome. Spatial-Omics compatibility is being validated. For more information check this preprint: https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.06.16.545221v2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":209,"length":59}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EDB4747C1B3611EEAFD80A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.06.16.545221v2"}}}}

groups.title: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community
Single Cell Core, Harvard Medical School

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"8v9ie","text":"Notes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72m44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r2s2","text":"All washes and centrifugations need to be done at   unless otherwise specified. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8uki1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1231o","text":"IMPORTANT: Washing volumes may change accordingly to your needs. If you want to change the protocol, let’s discuss just in case. Time, temperatures and concentrations must be maintained. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etl7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pqgn","text":"DSP has been used before for fixing cells and prep RNA, it works fine. For single cell or tissue following dissociation is what we have been studying and works well. It's still work in progress, but the key is to keep the stock fixative away from water because it neutralizes the NHS-esters quickly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sm10","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r38l","text":"Points to take into account:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atuea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lr5u","text":"CRITICAL: Prepare working solution (1x) right before fixation (no more than 5 minutes). For larger pieces replace with fresh 1x fixative a couple of times. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5et2a","text":"make single use aliquots (20-50 uL) for 2 to 5 fixations. What's not used do not re-freeze (it is fine to re freeze let's not give them the option)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duhjt","text":"keep aliquots at   in a bag (with silica if possible).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2j13q","text":"bring tubes at   and prepare the fixation a few minutes (no longer than 10 min) before fixing. This will ensure that the NHS-ester isn't in contact with aqueous solution for too long.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ci77m","text":"evaluate small precipitation during fixation. Too much ppt: bad. You should see a small ppt on the walls of the tube, like in the attached photo. You will notice that the first 2 drops of PBS will be generate the precipitate but will precipitate as you add more.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"863i4","text":"do not prepare aliquots larger than  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2847e","text":"do not store 1x solutions.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0tkk","text":"We have noticed some performance variability from vial to vial purchased from Sigma. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89m66","text":"Viability is not a good measure because PI or Trypan Blue don't enter after fixation and the cells look alive. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6q862","text":"So far, the best test has been the small shift in the LMO-FAM or LMO-Cy5 on cells.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89pha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99dfi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"90ABA3E0118E11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"838D5550118E11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AA066C80118E11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"B45854A0118E11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4cm8d","text":"Immediately before use prepare   of   DSP working solution (DSP 1x is also known as OzSoup) in molecular biology grade 1x PBS as follows: aliquot   of stock DSP in a 1.5mL eppi tube and while vortexing (VERY IMPORTANT) add   of PBS ( ) dropwise using a P200.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":146,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":223,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":233,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"F60A5CD010EA11EE95621D09D16091C3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"F9D7435010EA11EE95621D09D16091C3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1798}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"03689A9010EB11EE95621D09D16091C3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"490","error":false,"guid":"07AC5EC010EB11EE95621D09D16091C3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CA9673F0118E11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj8cn","text":"Optional: If storing for later processing or shipping samples, freeze cells using a cryopreservation strategy as if the main goal was to keep the cells alive. For example, use CryoStor10 and Mr Frosty for slow freezing. Include 1-2 U/uL of RNAse inhibitor per sample for storage. Store   until use. After storage, thaw in water bath at   and wash cells twice with PBS+0.5-1%BSA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":286,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":336,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"77v9l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B3DEAD40118D11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B702F7B0118D11EE87DBCD0E9F03B9AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
